function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage of key logistical equipment such as masks, face shields, gloves, and testing kits in hospitals","Impact":"Risk of compromised protection for healthcare workers and patients, leading to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increase production capacity, diversify supply chains, and invest in stockpile management","Technologies":"3-D printing, computer-aided design, cloud-based open access platform","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, general public","Owner":"Manufacturers, government, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Rapid manufacturing of portable isolation units using 3-D printing technology","Impact":"Lack of sufficient isolation units for quarantine objectives during pandemics","Mitigation":"Invest in rapid manufacturing technologies, build emergency stockpiles of isolation units, and establish strategic distribution networks","Technologies":"3-D printing, cloud-based open access platform","People":"Pandemic response organizations, healthcare institutions, government","Owner":"Manufacturers, pandemic response organizations"},{"Description":"Use of drones for monitoring compliance with social distancing measures and detecting potentially infected individuals","Impact":"Privacy concerns, potential misuse of surveillance technology, and public resistance to monitoring initiatives","Mitigation":"Implement strict privacy regulations, ensure transparency in drone use, and engage in community education and consultation","Technologies":"Drone technology, surveillance monitoring systems","People":"General public, government agencies, surveillance technology users","Owner":"Government, technology developers"}]}
